title: Concord center rental, Hubbard St, half of two-family
posting_body: Half of large two-family (side-by-side) house on Hubbard St. in Concord center.
One of the most desirable streets in town.
Highly walkable, with restaurants, shopping, commuter rail, elementary school, high school, etc. nearby.
Adjacent to Emerson Field, Hunt Recreation Center, and The Umbrella arts center.
Living room, dining room, kitchen, half-bath, and mudroom with washer and dryer downstairs.
For information please call (no text) Ken Olsen at number listed or email.
Tenant pays all utilities (electrical, oil heat, gas (for hot water and cooking), water, and sewer).
Applicant credit check required via Experian Connect.
For information please call (no text) Ken Olsen at 978-509-5081
